input.sentences: we took a road trip that started at the brewery .
as we pasted the fields | we saw lots of snow .
then we came to some horses still out in the snow .
in one of the fields | we saw large bundles of hay .
after that we saw two tires alone in the fields .
output.sentences: We went for a trip to Kansas
